snippet: The Essex County Prosecutor’s Office said that the grand jury’s decision ended the criminal investigation into the death of the man, Abdul Kamal, in Irvington, N.J., in November 2013.
abstract: Grand jury in New Jersey chooses not to indict three police officers involved in 2013 fatal shooting of Irvington man Abdul Kamal.
lead_paragraph: The Essex County Prosecutor’s Office said that the grand jury’s decision ended the criminal investigation into the death of the man, Abdul Kamal, in Irvington, N.J., in November 2013.

headline.main: Three Officers in New Jersey Are Not Indicted in 2013 Shooting
headline.print_headline: Three Officers Aren’t Indicted in a 2013 Death
